interfaces

Interface Player

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Character, Entity, Moveable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayerEntity

    public interface Player
extends Character

    • Method Summary

      Pickupable drop()
      Drops an item
      Pickupable[] getBackpack()
      Returns an array of the players inventory
      java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double getExtendedBoundingBox()
      Returns a large bounding box used for the attack radius

      Adds a given item to the players inventory

      Changes the players help item to the given item in the inventory
      boolean use()
      Uses the consumable item in the players hand, returns false if failed, it not consumable

    • Method Detail

      • selectItem

        void selectItem(int i)
        Changes the players help item to the given item in the inventory
        Parameters:
        i - the int for the inventory slot to because the hand

      • use

        boolean use()
        Uses the consumable item in the players hand, returns false if failed, it not consumable
        Returns:
        True if the consumable was successfully used

      • getBackpack

        Returns an array of the players inventory
